Question: This person fantasizes about a future romance with Morag, but his plans are crushed when he learns Morag had sixty other pen pals.
Hints: In a strip from 1979, in which this person is in hospital, Lucy promises she will never pull the football away again.
Rerun does not reveal whether this person kicks the ball or not.
This person is almost always addressed by his full name by other characters in the strip.
